Label: radius_mean
Description: radius (mean of distances from center to points on the perimeter)

Label: concavity_mean
Description: concavity (severity of concave portions of the contour)

Label: concave points_mean
Description: concave points (number of concave portions of the contour)

Label: radius_worst
Description: "worst" or largest (mean of the three largest values) of these features
